Class Simulator

java.lang.Object
com.swiftfox.scheduler.Simulator
public final class Simulator extends Object
Simulates the execution of scheduling algorithms over a list of Processes.

This class integrates a Scheduler with a GanttChart to visualize process execution and collect timing information. It supports both live and static simulations.

  • Constructor Details

    • Simulator

      public Simulator(List<Process> processes, Scheduler scheduler, GanttChart ganttChart)
      Constructs a Simulator instance.
      Parameters:
      processes - the list of processes to simulate
      scheduler - the scheduler to use (e.g., FCFS, SJF)
      ganttChart - the Gantt chart to populate with execution entries
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any argument is null

  • Method Details

    • addProcess

      public void addProcess(Process process)
      Adds a process to the simulator. If simulation is running, the process is moved to the ready queue.
      Parameters:
      process - the process to add

    • runLive

      public void runLive()
      Starts the simulation in live mode. Each tick waits 1 second (1000 ms).

    • runStatic

      public void runStatic()
      Starts the simulation in static mode. The simulation runs without delay between ticks.

    • allProcessesTerminated

      public boolean allProcessesTerminated()
      Returns whether all processes in the simulation have terminated.
      Returns:
      true if all processes have state TERMINATED; false otherwise
